name: Lupita
greetingText: I hope you are having a good day
wishText: May you always have the best coffee :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yayy you are 22 now
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now go have an amazing day!! Happy Birthday!! yes the hat goes there lol
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
